thread.title: Shaquille O’Neal gave us an awkward first look at his new statue
thread.title_full: Shaquille O’Neal gave us an awkward first look at his new statue

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Shaquille O’Neal gave us an awkward first look at his new statue
text:
It will be great once it’s finished!
Shaquille O’Neal will have his statue unveiled at Staples Center on Friday and Shaq himself gave us our first look at the real thing.
Thank You Buss Family! #speechless pic.twitter.com/vkcKtKB7i6 
— SHAQ (@SHAQ) March 22, 2017 Well ... this is certainly not the picture I would choose to display such a magnificent work of art but that’s just me. It looks like Shaq is wearing a diaper first and foremost. And if you weren’t sure, you’d think this may be the position of the actual statue. I do appreciate the detail with the Superman tattoo on his arm though.
Either way, this status is going to be beautiful . Gold-plated and all.
Lakers announce that a statue of Shaq will be unveiled at Star Plaza outside Staples Center prior to the Lakers game on March 24, 2017. pic.twitter.com/4tZxNOp1Py 
— Baxter Holmes (@BaxterHolmes) December 20, 2016 Congrats, Shaq!
